summary: MS Computer Science student at Northeastern University with a **3.89 GPA**, bringing **strong programming skills** and **production experience** in **distributed systems**. Previously at LSEG, **engineered scalable backend services** processing **7.5M+ records** daily across **180+ countries**. Proficient in **Python**, **Java**, **Go**, **AWS**, **Kubernetes**, and **Docker**, with **knowledge of microservices** and **big data** pipelines. Eager to apply **experience** in cloud infrastructure and **Machine learning** to build robust solutions.

skills.items: Distributed Systems, Microservices, RESTful APIs, Spring Boot, FastAPI
AWS (EC2, S3, Lambda), Kubernetes, Docker, Terraform, CI/CD
Apache Kafka, Apache Spark, ETL Pipelines, Data Warehousing
PyTorch, TensorFlow, Scikit-learn, Deep Learning, Reinforcement Learning

bullets: Engineered **scalable backend services** in **Java** and **Python** for a **distributed system**, processing **7.5M+ records** daily across **180+ countries**.
Developed and optimized **RESTful APIs** using **Spring Boot**, reducing data retrieval latency by **40%** and improving throughput by **3x**.
Implemented **microservices architecture** on **AWS** using **Kubernetes** and **Docker**, enhancing system resilience and deployment efficiency by **25%**.
Designed and managed **big data processing pipelines** with **Apache Kafka** and **Spark**, ensuring **99.9% data consistency** for critical financial transactions.
Collaborated with **cross-functional teams** to integrate new features, delivering **2 major product releases** ahead of schedule.
Developed **Python-based data pipelines** for ETL processes, improving data ingestion speed by **30%** for client analytics platforms.
Optimized **SQL database queries** and schemas for a large-scale data warehouse, reducing query execution time by **20%**.
Automated data validation and reporting tools using **Python scripts**, decreasing manual effort by **15 hours/week**.
Contributed to the design and implementation of a new data integration module, supporting **5+ client projects** simultaneously.

projects.title: Custom Kubernetes Operator
projects.bullet1: Developed a **Custom Kubernetes Operator** in **Go** to automate deployment and lifecycle management of stateful applications, reducing manual configuration by **60%**.
projects.bullet2: Implemented custom resource definitions (CRDs) and controllers, enhancing cluster resource utilization by **20%** and ensuring **99.9% uptime** for managed services.

projects.title: Deep Reinforcement Learning Agent
projects.bullet1: Designed and trained a **Deep Reinforcement Learning agent** using **PyTorch** with **1.5M parameters** to solve complex control tasks, achieving **95% optimal performance**.
projects.bullet2: Optimized model training pipelines on **AWS EC2** instances, reducing training time by **30%** and demonstrating **strong understanding** of ML infrastructure.

projects.title: Scalable Learning Management System
projects.bullet1: Architected and implemented **RESTful APIs** for user authentication and course management using **Node.js** and **MongoDB**, handling **1000+ concurrent users**.
projects.bullet2: Deployed backend services on **AWS Lambda** and **API Gateway**, ensuring **high availability** and **scalability** while reducing operational costs by **25%**.
